actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to abolish the Environmental Protection Agency and transfer its administrative authority over specified environmental programs to other appropriate agencies.

summary.text: National Environmental Reorganization Act - Transfers authority vested in the Environmental Protection Agency by specified Acts of Congress to the Department of the Interior, Department of Health, Education, and Welfare, Department of Agriculture, Nuclear Regulatory Commission, and the Department of Transportation. Abolishes the Environmental Protection Agency.

titles.title: A bill to abolish the Environmental Protection Agency and transfer its administrative authority over specified environmental programs to other appropriate agencies.
